name: pureya
description:
Pureya is a collection of arcade minigames that play with just 2 buttons.
Every 10 seconds, the game will jump from one minigame to the next.
Avoid obstacles and collect marbles, then use them in a pachinko machine to unlock skins and new minigames.
Features:
· 30 minigames.
· Hundreds of skins.
· Dynamic difficulty that goes up or down according to your performance.
· Dynamic music with random tracks that link together as a single song.
· Play all the minigames 10 seconds at a time or individually in a score attack.
